name: blender-skills
description: Expert skills for Blender 5.x: geometry nodes, shader nodes, compositing nodes, Python scripting (operators, panels, add-ons), animation & rigging (keyframes, drivers, constraints, armatures), modeling & modifiers (bmesh, modifier stack), physics simulation (rigid body, cloth, fluid, particles), and scene & rendering (render engines, output, import/export, color management). Provides complete API references, node/modifier/constraint catalogs, recipes, and debugging guides. Prefers Blender MCP when available.
